author: shafika_s
title: Surprisingly OK..!
text:
Having had a previous horrible experience at IBIS Barking I vowed never to stay at another IBIS hotel again.
I had to stay here as my client had already pre-booked the room for me. I was expecting the worst and had been dreading the overnight stay for a while but was pleasantly surprised. thank god..!
The room was refurbished to a decent (budget hotel) standard.. It was clean, inviting and modern. There could be small improvements /maintenance to the bathroom door and inside the bathroom. I do recommend rubber slippers to use in there as its more like a wet room and I feel better with some slippers on.
The staff were excellent - very friendly and helpful. A credit to the hotel.
Perfect location and 5min walk to stratford station, westfield shopping centre etc.
would I stay here again.. yes..!
Room Tip: 305 was a good room. See more room tips
